data.message: Hi FACEBOOK. Status or posts are spreading again regarding the privacy issues and facebook hack virus information, making fb users copy and paste those particular posts to validate their account yet, I believe so that it's only you guys who can spread announcements regarding your services and app or site problems. Reply to this post that those statuses are false and has no basis. I'll prtscrn your answer to make my friends calm and assured that even not posting words for verification(fake) their account will not being affected. Thanks Facebook!

replies.message: Hi, Jorge. They are false. Please report these types of messages as spam by following these steps listed in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2dXnjLY.  -Rhea
